title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Disney releases a new premium card with a $600 bonus, annual park benefits and more
items.description: Disney unveils a new premium credit card with a $600 offer, annual park perks and bonus category earning rates. Meet the Disney Inspire Visa Card.

items.title: Act fast: Earn the Southwest Companion Pass by booking just 1 round-trip flight
items.description: Southwest's 2026 Companion Pass promotion lets you earn this valuable perk for a fraction of the usual cost.

items.title: JetBlue to offer lounge day passes at New York's JFK: Here's what it will cost
items.description: JetBlue is now allowing certain elite status members, credit card holders and Mint passengers to purchase one-time access to its new BlueHouse lounge ...

items.title: Credit card transfer bonuses (February): 50% bonus to Marriott Bonvoy, 30% bonus to Japan Airlines and more
items.description: Here's a look at all the current transfer bonuses involving major credit cards and airline and hotel loyalty programs.
